body: Hunnapuh [es] asks if El Salvador has learned "the lesson" 10 years after the January 13 earthquake. Blogger "Jjmar" answers the question reporting that construction companies still build homes in vulnerable places, and that people still purchase and live in these high-risk homes.
original_body: Hunnapuh [es] asks if El Salvador has learned "the lesson" 10 years after the January 13 earthquake. Blogger "Jjmar" answers the question reporting that construction companies still build homes in vulnerable places, and that people still purchase and live in these high-risk homes.
title: El Salvador: A Decade Since the January 13 Earthquake
